title: Cinematic Transitions
description: 'Cinematic Transitions' by Cinematic Sound Design delivers a collection of more than 100 high-definition, hand-crafted transition sound effects.
longDescription:
'Cinematic Transitions' by Cinematic Sound Design delivers a collection of more than 100 high-definition, hand-crafted transition sound effects. A range of techniques were used in the process of designing this library to deliver this highly usable collection.


Inside you'll find a variety of whooshes, swooshes, flybys, spaceships, snaps, falls, splats, crushes and more. This library serves a wide range of applications, such as film, games, multimedia projects, music productions, podcasts, even company logos.


Equipment Used:


• Sound Devices 702 Field Recorder

• 2 Neumann KM184 Microphones

• Apogee Symphony AD/DA

• Access Virus Ti

• Waldorf Pulse 2

• DSI Prophet 


Product Details:


• 109 Hand Crafted Transition Sound Effects

• 24-Bit/96kHz Quality

• WAV & Apple Loops Formats

• Metadata Sheet Included

• 100% Royalty-Free

• 24-Bit/44.1kHz

• Compatible with all DAWs


Preview: https://soundcloud.com/cinematic-sound-design/cinematic-transitions
technicalDetails:
Features: A collection of more than 100 high-definition, hand-crafted transition sound effects.

Number of Audio Waves: 109 (44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs)

Number of Audio Waves: 109 (96 kHz, 24bit Stereo WAVs)

Number of Audio Cues: 109

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 6:16

Supported Development Platforms: All platforms that support universal WAV files.
